main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified flying objects were reported in Miami, Florida, between April and August 1952.
interesting points: Two dark-opaque circular objects were observed passing the full moon with maneuvers and appeared well-defined at the trailing edge., A round white brilliant object was seen hovering and then moving at high speed with no noise., One object was described as a point of light, much brighter than a star, moving at approximately 1000-1500 mph., Observers claimed that multiple unidentified flying objects were flying at high speeds and altitudes and maneuvered without sound., Reports indicated that one observation lasted about 30 seconds, while another lasted around 10 minutes with detailed descriptions of their shapes and maneuvers.
